title: Paying well above market!!!  NEED T206  Willis or Brown CHI SC 350-460 Factory 42
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: Paying well above market!!!  NEED T206  Willis or Brown CHI SC 350-460 Factory 42
posts.post_content:
Hi all,
I am down to the final card on the front back combo to fill the HOF backs line.  After comparing my stuff with the confirmed list, I have two options to fill this slot.  Anyone willing to part with a SC 350-460 Factory 42 (No overstrike) 3 Finger Brown or Willis Throwing in VG or VGEX graded condition??!!
I will pay well above market for one of these two cards, via Paypal.  I need to get the pot out to auction really quick to make up for some loss of income coming shortly.
Thanks for the help,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

Hey Bob,

The Crawford may be a no-print with that back - I don't know if anyone answered Scot out-of-band, but I didn't see it in the thread below and looks to be still unreported as of his last(?) "Inside T206" doc.

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=92540&highlight=SC460%2F42[/url]

--
Mike
Which T206 Crawford are you looking for?

Thanks for the replies folks.  I am looking for the Crawford with Bat.  That would explain why I haven't been able to locate one.
Bob

I read my list and checked it twice, only two cards that can fill the spot for me.
Anyone looking to sell?
Thanks as always,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

Sorry for the quick bump, but I need to add one of these two cards quickly to get the lot off to auction.  I need to put some cash together for some lost income coming this year (not sure how bad yet, but need to get some cash on hand).
Thanks for the help,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
